) OR ( q.state = 'YES' AND q.user_seq = ( SELECT seq FROM users WHERE id = #{id} ) ) ) AND t.start_date <= LEFT(NOW(),10) AND t.end_date >= LEFT(NOW(),10) AND t.flag = 'YES'
